scripts.migrate: yarn build && sequelize db:migrate --config dist/config/database.js --migrations-path dist/database/migrations
scripts.seed: yarn build && sequelize db:seed:all --config dist/config/database.js --seeders-path dist/database/seeds
scripts.undo-seed: yarn build && sequelize db:seed:undo:all --config dist/config/database.js --seeders-path dist/database/seeds
